title: Understanding Borderline Personality Disorder
text: Borderline personality disorder is a mental health condition characterized by a specific pattern of behavior and emotional instability. It is important to recognize the key features that define this disorder.

title: Key Features of Borderline Personality Disorder
text: Consider the emotional and behavioral patterns that are typically associated with borderline personality disorder. These often include instability in relationships, self-image, and emotions, as well as impulsive actions.

hintAnswer: a pervasive pattern of instability of interpersonal relationships, $$self-image$$, and affects, and marked impulsivity that begins by early adulthood and is present in a variety of contexts
